verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Where else can I go?
You alone have the words of eternal life.
Where else can I go?
You alone have the words of eternal life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You spoke and light was formed in darkness,
Just one word from You calmed the raging sea,
Your foolishness is wiser than all men
And when my heart condemns me
You are greater than my heart.
